ing: 1/2 cup oatmeal cereal squares (such as QuakerÂ® Oatmeal Squares), crushed
des: "An easy-to-put-together dessert dip that is perfect for a Halloween party or fun snack. The pretzels look like broomsticks after they've been dunked into this yummy, crunch dip."
ins: Stir peanut butter and chocolate-hazelnut spread together in a bowl; transfer dip to a serving bowl. Sprinkle crushed cereal squares over dip. Dip pretzel rods into dip to make 'broomsticks'.
